mapper.select: SELECT NO_USERID as writer, NO_TITLE as title, NO_CONTENTS as contents, TO_CHAR(NO_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-dd') as sdate, NO_FILEPATH as filepath, NO_FNAME as fname FROM PNT WHERE NO_CPCODE = #{cpcode}
SELECT CPCODE, PRCODE, PRNAME, PROPEN, TO_CHAR(PRDATE,'YYYY-MM-dd') AS PRDATE FROM PROJECTVIEW WHERE USERID = #{userid} AND CPCODE = #{cpcode}
SELECT PSNAME,STNAME,PSCODE FROM PROJECTVIEW WHERE CPCODE = #{cpcode} AND PRCODE = #{prcode}
SELECT SCCODE, SCNAME, SCSTCODE, SCSTATE, PSCODE FROM SCHEDULEVIEW WHERE CPCODE = #{cpcode} AND PRCODE = #{prcode} AND PSCODE = #{pscode}

SELECT SD.SD_CODE AS SDCODE, SD.SD_NAME AS SDNAME, SD.SD_TITLE AS SDCONTENT, TO_CHAR(SD.SD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-dd') AS SDDATE, ST.ST_CODE AS SDDCODE, ST.ST_NAME AS SDDSTATE, CM.CM_UNAME AS USERNAME, SD.SD_USERID AS USERID FROM SD INNER JOIN ST ON SD.SD_STATE = ST.ST_CODE INNER JOIN CM ON SD.SD_CPCODE = CM.CM_CPCODE AND SD.SD_USERID = CM.CM_USERID WHERE SD.SD_CPCODE = #{cpcode} AND SD.SD_PRCODE = #{prcode} AND SD.SD_PSCODE = #{pscode} AND SD.SD_SCCODE = #{sccode} AND SD.SD_USERID = #{userid}
